GQAnalyzer 0.1.0
  • Reference

GQAnalyzer: A package for Hydrogeochemical plotting

GQAnalyzer.Rd

This package provides functions to create the following plots:

  • Piper plot

  • Stiff diagrams

  • Durov plot

  • Ternary

  • Radial

  • Multirectangular

  • Maucha

Anomaly Utilities

This section includes functions used in the identification of anomalies in groundwater quality data.

This section includes

Compositional-ILR Diagram

The functions defined to create a diagram with an ILR transform are: ilr_transform, plot_ilr

Durov Diagram

The Durov diagram is a composite diagram that includes a central rectangular diagram of

This section includes the definition of three functions used to create the Durov diagram: durov_transform, durov_transform1, ggplot_durov

Geothermometers

The functions defined to calculate the temperatures of the geothermal reservoir from the concentrations of some chemical species.

Giggenbach Diagrams

The functions defined to create the Giggenbach diagrams are:

Maucha Diagram

The functions defined to create a Multirectangular diagram are: maucha_transform, ggplot_maucha

Mixing Utilities

This section is devoted to functions used in the study of mixing processes from hydrogeochenmical information.

This section includes the definition of five functions: m3_mixing_model,select_end_members,uncertainty_m3_mixing_model,plot_m3_mixing_results,constrained_lm

Multirectangular Diagram

The functions defined to create a Multirectangular diagram are: multirectangular_transform, ggplot_multirectangular

Piper Diagram

The functions defined to create a Piper diagram are: anion_cation_tranform, transform_piper_data, ggplot_piper

Modified Piper Diagram

The functions defined to create a Modified Piper diagram are: transform_modified_piper_data, ggplot_modified_piper

Radial Diagram

The functions defined to create a Radial diagram are: radial_tranform, ggplot_radial

Stiff Diagram

The functions defined to create a Stiff diagram are: stiff_tranform, ggplot_stiff

Ternary Plot

The functions defined to create a Ternary plot are: ternary_transform, ggplot_ternary
